name: Rather Simple YouTube
author: Jorijn Schrijvershof

sections.description: This plug-in is different than other because it requires no pasting of special URL’s or remembering embed codes. The first step is to fill in your own (or someone else’s) YouTube username in the settings page. After this you can select any of your uploaded videos in the included widget.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the archive in wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin in your WordPress administrative interface.
  3. Change the settings of the plug-in
  4. Insert a new video widget
sections.faq:
Where can I registrer a complaint?

The authors of this plugin are not responsible for any technical or personal injuries caused by this plugin.

Will this plugin stay free?

Yes, this plugin will remain free forever. No money will ever be charged for this plugin.

Can I modify this plugin?

This code was released under the GPLv2 license. You can change the code as much as you want.

Something’s not working as it should, where can I file a bugreport?

You can file bugreports at GitHub: https://github.com/Jorijn/rather-simple-youtube/issues

short_description: A rather simple YouTube plug-in that allows the administrator to fill in a YouTube user and select a video to embed into a page.
description: This plug-in is different than other because it requires no pasting of special URL’s or remembering embed codes. The first step is to fill in your own (or someone else’s) YouTube username in the settings page. After this you can select any of your uploaded videos in the included widget.
